d4fbbed0-df82-44a9-b2b5-a9d283348da3.description: The Data Warehouse badge is the first badge in Snowflake's Hands On Essentials Series. Users earning this credential have completed coursework, passed a written exam and scored 90% or better on submitted project work. Topics covered: User Roles, Navigation, Creating Database Objects, Virtual Warehouse creation and configuration, loading and querying CSV and JSON data.
d4fbbed0-df82-44a9-b2b5-a9d283348da3.name: Hands On Essentials - Data Warehouse

badge_template_activities.title: Earners have viewed instructional videos or lectures and carried out corresponding lab exercises using a live Snowflake environment.
Earners have passed a written exam with a score of 90% or better.
Earners have submitted graded project work including databases and warehouses, SQL code, and evidence of an ability to load and query standardized as well as JSON data. (Scoring 90% or better)

aed8f892-f216-4887-9103-a8a65cf74a0e.description: SnowPro Core Certified individuals have demonstrated the knowledge necessary to apply specific core expertise in the marketplace with customers implementing and migrating to Snowflake. A SnowPro Core Certified individual has a thorough understanding of Snowflake as a cloud data warehouse and has the knowledge necessary to design, develop and manage secure, scalable Snowflake solutions to drive business objectives.
aed8f892-f216-4887-9103-a8a65cf74a0e.name: SnowPro Core Certification

badge_template_activities.title: Received a passing score on Snowflake's SnowPro Core Certification Exam.

d202b7d3-9e8d-4318-93ad-560c290c6936.description: The Data Sharing badge is the third badge in Snowflake's Hands On Essentials Series. Users earning this credential have demonstrated an ability to use Snowflake's three data sharing technologies, including: Direct Sharing, the Snowflake Data Marketplace, and Snowflake's Private Data Exchanges. Sign up for the free workshop at learn.snowflake.com
d202b7d3-9e8d-4318-93ad-560c290c6936.name: Hands On Essentials - Data Sharing

badge_template_activities.title: Earners have carried out lab exercises using a live Snowflake environment which are confirmed by a grading script. Earners have set up databases, tables, views, managed accounts, users, warehouses, resource monitors, direct shares and much more.

10b65aec-b401-4a00-8b2a-467493c1f865.description: The Data Applications badge is the second badge in Snowflake's Hands On Essentials Series. Users earning this credential have demonstrated an ability to use Python to read from and write to their Snowflake database tables. Badge earners after April 2022 built a Streamlit application which can be viewed as part of their GitHub repository. Please contact the badge earner for details. Badge Earners Prior to May 2022 built an IOT data pipeline using SoftwareAG tools.
10b65aec-b401-4a00-8b2a-467493c1f865.name: Hands On Essentials - Data Applications

badge_template_activities.title: Earners complete over 30 step-by-step labs to build a Python web application using Streamlit, Snowflake, and learn to use a number of other tools in the process.

Learners can share their Streamlit app to show you the result of their Streamlit work. The backend will expire as it will be built on a Snowflake Trial, but other elements of the site will continue to be operational.
Earners have submitted code to Snowflake's DORA grader and logged proof that they have successfully created objects and loaded data to the required tables in Snowflake.

167f8e91-a82c-4b62-9655-80b033187d07.description: This Hands On Workshop covers tools and techniques for accessing and analyzing non-loaded data (aka data in a Data Lake). It also covers tools and techniques for making use of Unstructured Data (images in particular). Finally, it provides hands on experience with two GeoSpatial Data Types (GeoJSON and WKT) including the use of several Snowflake GeoSpatial Functions and the writing of a User Defined Function that leverages existing GeoSpatial functions.
167f8e91-a82c-4b62-9655-80b033187d07.name: Hands On Essentials - Data Lake

badge_template_activities.title: Learners carry out lab work and submit the lab work to an automated grading engine. Lab work must be passed at 100% accuracy.

dee9e6a5-c3c0-43b8-b7e9-8c461a837c79.description: Snowflake Sales Professional (SSP) Accredited individuals have completed Snowflake’s partner sales curriculum that is designed to give Partner sellers a foundational knowledge of Snowflake’s Data Cloud, the key workloads, and how to position the offering with customers. It is a complimentary online training program for partners, and it is aligned to the foundational Snowflake sales onboarding path.
dee9e6a5-c3c0-43b8-b7e9-8c461a837c79.name: Snowflake Sales Professional Accreditation

badge_template_activities.title: Completed 9 modules (4 hours) of self-paced learning via On-Demand video tracks
Received a passing score on the Snowflake Sales Professional proficiency exam.

4315e277-47f5-47c0-a408-aea3c06d20a8.description: Snowflake Technical Sales Professional (STSP) Accredited individuals have completed Snowflake’s partner technical sales curriculum that is designed to give Partner pre-sales engineers a deeper foundational knowledge of Snowflake’s Data Cloud architecture, differentiators, and positioning Snowflake’s technical capabilities and value drivers to customers. STSP is a complimentary online training program for partners, and Snowflake Sales Pro (SSP) Accreditation is a prerequisite for earning STSP.
4315e277-47f5-47c0-a408-aea3c06d20a8.name: Snowflake Technical Sales Professional Accreditation

badge_template_activities.title: Completed 9 modules (4 hours) of self-paced learning via On-Demand video tracks.
Received a passing score on the Snowflake Sales Professional proficiency exam.
Received a passing score on the Snowflake Technical Sales Professional proficiency exam.

20ff11bf-a151-419f-9314-c3ca6c047ad2.description: The 5th Badge in the Hands On Essentials Series, this workshop covers some advanced concepts needed by those who want to work toward the job title of Data Engineer.
20ff11bf-a151-419f-9314-c3ca6c047ad2.name: Hands On Essentials - Data Engineering

badge_template_activities.title: The workshop requires you to view some videos (or read the transcripts), read the presented content, answer questions correctly and more. At the end of the workshop, you will have also completed the labs.
Labs must be completed to earn the badge. The labs are auto-graded by a system called DORA. When all DORA checks have been completed, the badge is automatically issued.

ddade7d6-890c-42ef-a432-3d36d4ff2dd0.description: A certified SnowPro Advanced: Architect has demonstrated specific knowledge and skills related to the design, development and implementation of Snowflake solutions by successfully passing the certification exam. The individual has demonstrated the application of Snowflake best practices, advanced tuning and real-world deployment scenarios.
ddade7d6-890c-42ef-a432-3d36d4ff2dd0.name: SnowPro Advanced: Architect

badge_template_activities.title: Received a passing score on SnowPro Advanced: Architect Certification Exam

c169062c-e477-42ac-8cf0-f7651dcc533a.description: The Data Cloud Deployment Framework (DCDF) Assessment Badge certifies an individual’s knowledge in designing, deploying, and managing the Snowflake landscape. Earners have obtained a strong foundation in six core areas, including: 9 Core Objectives, Data Architecture, Business Entity Environments, Multi-Region Business Entity, Incremental Processing, and Naming Conventions.
c169062c-e477-42ac-8cf0-f7651dcc533a.name: Data Cloud Deployment Framework

badge_template_activities.title: Completed 6 modules (~30 minutes) of self-paced learning via On-Demand video tracks.
Received a passing score of 90% or better on knowledge assessments.

c474f61e-9b46-4fbc-a478-afb51e191f2c.description: A certified SnowPro Advanced: Data Engineer has demonstrated advanced knowledge and skills used to apply comprehensive data engineering principles using Snowflake.
c474f61e-9b46-4fbc-a478-afb51e191f2c.name: SnowPro Advanced: Data Engineer

badge_template_activities.title: Received a passing score on SnowPro Advanced: Data Engineer Certification exam.

f6b08f27-72f3-4809-b84a-250e0be3ec69.description: The Change Data Captured Badge series is for Snowflake professionals who attend a hands on workshop that covers a year's worth of Snowflake feature improvements. The 2022 badge is the first in the Series and is awarded to those learners in attendance at the Snowflake Summit 2022 Change Data Captured Hands On Workshop.
f6b08f27-72f3-4809-b84a-250e0be3ec69.name: SUMMIT 2022: Change Data Captured

badge_template_activities.title: Attendance at Summit 2022 Change Data Captured Hands On Workshop.
DORA Lab work assessments.

ef9c7aa4-52bb-460f-98ac-a96f3cea44c8.description: A certified SnowPro Advanced: Administrator has demonstrated advanced knowledge and skills to apply comprehensive data cloud administrative principles using Snowflake and its components.
ef9c7aa4-52bb-460f-98ac-a96f3cea44c8.name: SnowPro Advanced: Administrator

badge_template_activities.title: Received a passing score on SnowPro Advanced: Administrator Certification exam

68351502-0bbf-4cb9-a0bc-35d19957854f.description: A certified SnowPro Advanced: Analyst has demonstrated advanced knowledge and skills to apply comprehensive data analysis principles using Snowflake and its components.
68351502-0bbf-4cb9-a0bc-35d19957854f.name: SnowPro Advanced: Data Analyst

badge_template_activities.title: Received a passing score on SnowPro Advanced: Data Analyst Certification exam

473c5fff-2ee1-4c49-b8b3-b934aaa85a8c.description: A certified SnowPro Advanced: Data Scientist has demonstrated advanced knowledge and skills used to apply comprehensive data science principles, tools, and methodologies using Snowflake.
473c5fff-2ee1-4c49-b8b3-b934aaa85a8c.name: SnowPro Advanced: Data Scientist

badge_template_activities.title: Received a passing score on SnowPro Advanced: Data Scientist Certification exam.

a19cfb69-85dc-4f76-86e2-ba414336bd81.description: The SnowPro Subject Matter Expert (SME) badge is for industry professionals who have contributed to multiple exam development events for Snowflake’s SnowPro Certifications.
a19cfb69-85dc-4f76-86e2-ba414336bd81.name: SnowPro Subject Matter Expert

badge_template_activities.title: Snowflake Certification experience and expertise vetted
SnowPro Certifications are in good standing
Volunteered time and talents to participate in at least three exam development events within a two-year period (e.g., item writing campaign)
